column4: hello im a some what experienced ubuntu user but i cant seem to get the internet to work one of my computers
i can reach the local network and my router but not my internet
ampelbein: :P point taken, everythign is set right and i have tried it as auto dhcp and tried setting everything to static
if it's hardwired ethernet should just work, if wireless well you can get issues.  I can't really help you, so I am just saying here
